name: That Girl
description:
'That Girl' is a short Visual Novella and experiment in branching storytelling.

The unnamed protagonist of the story is intrigued by a mysterious girl in his class who constantly stares at him whenever she has the chance. His other classmates treat her as if she isn't even there, and she mostly keeps to herself, but there is just something about her...

Your choices will lead the story in various directions, with multiple endings.

You will only be able to unravel the mystery of That Girl with multiple playthroughs.
